title: You Know, Nyah
body:
After hearing about the new skins, I just couldn't help myself!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I kinda hope this is the birth of more cat-centric skins.
Such as Cat Lady Yorick, or Dog Walker/Cat Walker Thresh? They're purrrfect.
Kitty Cat Urgot and Rek'sai as well!

OI, leave my {{champion:421}} outta this. She's a badass void... land shark... thing. 

Would be kinda cute though.

NO, BAD! she's Badass, not cute...

But... she would be adorable...

hope so, we could always use more cat skins:

{{champion:6}} cat-got
{{champion:16}} sora-cat
{{champion:32}} cat-mumu
{{champion:96}} kog-meow
{{champion:20}} mewnu
you missed your opportunity to say 'Amewmew' {{item:3070}} {{item:2049}}
The Soracat is absolutely needed
Kog'Meow tho.
5/7 will buy
Amoomoo first.

Such beautiful fan art! I've been looking forward to this one for a long time. I love cats but am too allergic to have one, although Meowkai tells me his idyllic space-cats are allergen free. Ty Meowkai >xD
aren't exploding space cats are more dangerous than allergies? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
At least they are the ones exploding.
I'm guessing you don't have allergies >;)
https://49.media.tumblr.com/5e48858f78b7c31e1cd7c1f462a3f47e/tumblr_n7cgqujYrz1sial0xo9_250.gif
The name is genius, but I just don't think the skin itself goes with Maokai.
true that
that... that was fast .__.
Got a request in stream and rolled with it!
Ahhhh, I love this! :3
I'm glad! And thanks c:
Thank you for filling a void I didn't know I had. This is fantastic.
No thank you B) and double thanks for that unintentional pun!

"Like uh.. y'know. Nya."
"What?"
"Nya."
"Stop."
I remember that meme.
that name
Squealed soon as I saw this skin, you did it such justice amigo <3
I did too! I thought it was fake for a second! But all my dreams have come true. Thank yoooou!
I'm buying this skin, and there's nothing you can do to stop me.
YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAS.
